sn22.27:4.2: “Mendicants, I went in search of form’s gratification,
sn22.27:4.4: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of form’s gratification.
sn22.27:4.5: I went in search of form’s drawback,
sn22.27:4.7: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of form’s drawback.
sn22.27:4.8: I went in search of form’s escape,
sn22.27:4.10: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of form’s escape.
sn22.27:4.11: I went in search of the gratification of feeling …
sn22.27:4.16: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of consciousness’s gratification.
sn22.27:4.17: I went in search of consciousness’s drawback,
sn22.27:4.19: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of consciousness’s drawback.
sn22.27:4.20: I went in search of consciousness’s escape,
sn22.27:4.22: I’ve seen clearly with wisdom the full extent of consciousness’s escape.
sn22.27:4.23: As long as I didn’t truly understand these five grasping aggregates’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I didn’t announce my supreme perfect awakening …
sn22.27:4.24: But when I did truly understand these five grasping aggregates’ gratification, drawback, and escape for what they are, I announced my supreme perfect awakening …
sn22.27:4.25: Knowledge and vision arose in me:
sn22.27:4.26: ‘My freedom is unshakeable; this is my final birth; now there are no more future lives.’”
